attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms), we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. They are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. If you wish to write to the PM, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
